pages.title: Dashboard
pages.text: NxFilter administration dashboard.

pages.title: Policy
pages.text: Filtering policies for users and groups.

pages.title: Proxy
pages.text: NxFilter agent settings for local proxy.

pages.title: Free Time
pages.text: Assign a free-time policy to users that will be applied during the time defined.

pages.title: Application
pages.text: NxFilter supports application control through its Active Directory single sign-on agent that is NxLogon and its remote user filtering agent, NxClient.

pages.title: Restart
pages.text: Restart NxFilter daemon on host.

pages.title: Daily Report
pages.text: Daily statistics report.

pages.title: Weekly Report
pages.text: Weekly statistics report.

pages.title: Usage Report
pages.text: Usage summary for the previous 30 days.

pages.title: Signal Log
pages.text: Log of signals from NxClient

pages.title: Requests Log
pages.text: Request log for users.

pages.title: Netflow Log
pages.text: Monitor imported NetFlow data if enabled.

pages.title: Users
pages.text: Create or edit users for NxFilter.

pages.title: Groups
pages.text: Create or edit groups for NxFilter.

pages.title: LDAP
pages.text: Server settings and import of users and groups from LDAP Directory.

pages.title: Active Directory
pages.text: Server settings and import of users and groups from Active Directory

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: System configuration parameters for NxFilter including authentication, DNS settings, syslog, netflow, and misc settings.

pages.title: Zone Transfer
pages.text: Setup zone-transfer for NxFilter to import the DNS zone on every minutes using IXFR protocol.

pages.title: Redirection
pages.text: Domain to IP or domain to domain redirection is possible with NxFilter. It works like a custom DNS record.

pages.title: Profile
pages.text: Change admin name and password for GUI login.

pages.title: Cluster
pages.text: Setup your NxFilter to be a master node or a slave node in a cluster.

pages.title: Block Page
pages.text: Setup for custom block-page, login-page, and welcome-page

pages.title: Backup
pages.text: Make a backup of config DB of NxFilter manually.

pages.title: Allowed IP
pages.text: NxFilter has IP based access restriction function for its DNS, GUI, login redirection.

pages.title: Alerts
pages.text: NxFilter sends alert email for recent blocking or clustering node down incidents.

pages.title: System Categories
pages.text: System categories are the domain categories defined by your blacklist DB or domain categorization DB.

pages.title: Whitelist by Keyword
pages.text: Create global or per-policy whitelist for a keyword.

pages.title: Whitelist by Domain
pages.text: Create global or per-policy whitelist for a domain.

pages.title: Test Domain
pages.text: Test domain name against blacklist database categories.

pages.title: Custom Categories
pages.text: Custom categories are the domain categories you define for yourself.
